Name: Greedy Maze
About the game: A casual next level maze game with 150 levels, in 5 different maze categories, with 3 full customizable modes and 12 color themes for anyone who likes maze solving. The main idea was to add some new features such as moving walls and a 3D weave type of maze. I visualized the classic dark mode and progress towards completion. Therefore I decided to show the whole maze for a few seconds so that the player could remember the path Can you solve all? Features: 12 themes 5 different types of mazes 30 levels for each type 3 different modes that can be used together Controls: W,A,S,D Keyboard arrows Game pad
